question: Recently, the Ministry of Communications has launched the Cool EMS Service which allows customers in India to import the food items for their personal use from which of the following countries?
explanation: Ministry of Communications has launched the Cool EMS Service. It is a one-way service that allows customers in India to import Japanese food for personal use. All the Food items will be carried by Japan Post in special cool boxes containing refrigerant to preserve the quality of the food items and then collected in India.
